input.name: reads
input.doc: BAM file containing reads for the alignment.

output.name: alignment
output.doc: (Sorted) alignment. A coordinate sorted file will be indexed, i.e. there is a .bai file.

parameter.name: options
parameter.doc: Options passed on to GSNAP command line. Overrides all other ways of specifying parameters.

parameter.name: cmdPrefix
parameter.doc: Prefix put before issued system commands (e.g. docker string)
